id: Reforecasts of river discharge and related data by the Global Flood Awareness System
description: This dataset provides a gridded modelled time series of river discharge, forced with medium- to sub-seasonal range meteorological reforecasts. The data is a consistent representation of a key hydrological variable across the global domain, and is a product of the Global Flood Awareness System (GloFAS).
title: Reforecasts of river discharge and related data by the Global Flood Awareness System
